original_text: And the prince who is among them shall lift his baggage upon his shoulder at dusk, and shall go out. They shall dig through the wall to bring him out through it. He shall cover his face, that he may not see the land with his eyes.
korean_text: 무리가 성벽을 뚫고 행장을 그리로 가지고 나가고 그 중에 왕은 어두울 때에 어깨에 행장을 메고 나가며 눈으로 땅을 보지 아니하려고 자기 얼굴을 가리리라 하라

sentences.original_text: And the prince who is among them
shall lift his baggage upon his shoulder
They shall dig through the wall
to bring him out through it
that he may not see the land with his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 눈으로 그 땅을 보지 못하게 하기 위해
